author: olegk
msg: HTTPCORE-355: HttpAsyncRequestExecutor fails when its handler is not ready to generate a request

author: kpreisser
msg: - Use protocol-relative URL for including the Apache image so that a HTTPS site does not contain elements loaded from HTTP.
- Use HTTPS instead of HTTP for the Google Search URL to prevent browser warnings when you access the Tomcat Site by HTTPS and because Google redirects you anyway to a HTTPS url.
